mapper.sql: id, code, name, url, icon, create_time, update_man_id, update_time, isleaf, iconcls, expanded, enabled, description, priority, create_man_id, pid
mapper.select: SELECT o.id as id, o.name as name, o.code as code, o.url as url, o.icon as icon, o.isleaf as isleaf, o.iconcls as iconcls, o.expanded as expanded, o.enabled as enabled, o.description as description, o.priority as priority, o.pid as pid FROM sys_menu o

SELECT
FROM sys_menu WHERE id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT r_role_menu.menu_id FROM r_role_menu r_role_menu LEFT JOIN r_role_user r_role_user ON r_role_user.role_id = r_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_suer sys_suer ON sys_suer.id = r_role_user.user_id WHERE sys_suer.username = #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ORDER BY pid, priority asc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (id, code, name, url, icon, create_time, update_man_id, update_time, isleaf, iconcls, expanded, enabled, description, priority, create_man_id, pid) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isleaf,jdbcType=BIT}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expanded,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_man_id = #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

iconcls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_man_id = #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_menu set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_man_id = #{updateManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=BIT}, iconcls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expanded = #{expanded,jdbcType=BIT}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_man_id = #{createManId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
